title: The Hunted
description: The Hunted is a supernatural fiction exploring the vampire genre with added elements containing magic and fur-backed creatures of blood gorging habits. The novel explores a strong, female heroin; sassy and genuine, encumbered by a severe problem with authority. Supporting characters are complimentary, humorous and with individual agendas that expand the storyâ€™s base into an exciting, horror-filled spectrum all softened with a hint of romance.
author: Kristy Berridge
